plot outline: Dayalan (Samuthirakani) joins a government school in a village as teacher. The pitiable condition of education in such government schools worries him. In the school, the teachers and students are like two rail tracks never meeting eye-to-eye. It bothers him more. The materialistic lives of the teachers play spoilsport on the children's motivation to learn. Dayalan expresses his desire to set things right. As expected, he faces the wrath of teachers and the students too. He introduces novel methods, gives confidence to students and motivates them to evince keen interest in education. But he faces a huge hurdle in the form of assistant headmaster Singam Perumal (Thambi Ramaiah).
title: Saattai

synopsis:
SAATTAI is based on the core of teaching, teacher who sacrifice his life for the teaching job.
The story is about a relation between a teacher and student. Samuthirakani famous director comes in a teacher role and thambi ramaiya also doing an important role.
Debut Hero and entry of Kerala beauty will be romancing in this film. Cinematography by Jeevan.
Music Scored by D.Imman with the lyrics scored by Yugabarathi.
Produced together by Prabhu Solomon and John Max.
Directed by young and dynamic student and assistant of Prabhu Solomon - M.Anbazhagan.
